summary: This memorandum details a meeting between CIA representatives and E. Howard Hunt regarding his memoirs, 'Undercover.' The meeting focused on reviewing the manuscript for classified information and potentially sensitive content. Agreed changes were made to several items, and other concerns were discussed with Hunt and his lawyers.
title: Meeting with E. Howard Hunt Re His Memoirs, "Undercover"
recipient: Acting DDO, SAB/DDO, DC/CI Staff, O/Security, Asst. to DCI, Mr. Walter Pforzheimer, C/CCS
sender: John D. Morrison, Jr., Acting General Counsel
